subject: Organized Labor
Athletics and Sports
Baseball
Steroids
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: With George Mitchell’s investigation into drug use looming over Major League Baseball, player agents were informed that up to 11 players who are now free agents could be named.
snippet: With George Mitchell’s investigation into drug use looming over Major League Baseball, player agents were informed that up to 11 players who are now free agents could be named.
